Regular trash pickup is every Wednesday. Heavy trash is picked up every other Wednesday.

[VIEW PICKUP DETAILS](https://www.cityofneedville.com/trash-pickup)

\*Please note all DCN meetings will now take place on the fourth Monday of each month.\*

\*Due to hazardous conditions created by the ongoing winter storm, the DCN meeting noticed for Monday, January 26th at 6:30 pm is being postponed pursuant to Texas government code 551.0411, until Wednesday, January 28th at 6:30 p.m.

Needville Draining Master Plan - City Hall Meeting

Come join us at City Hall on December 16, between 5:30 and 7:30, to hear about the results from the first Drainage Master Plan for the City. This will be an opportunity to understand the efforts taken to assess flood risks within the community and how they can be addressed in the future.

Date: December 16, 2025
